ingredients.ingredient: 7 large carrots, peeled and cut in half lengthwise

cookingTips: Cut carrots lengthwise for even cooking and attractive presentation
High heat creates caramelization for sweetness and depth
Five-spice powder contains star anise, cloves, cinnamon, and Sichuan pepper
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Encourage the user to get proper browning on the carrots for caramelization and to taste the five-spice blend's complexity.
